sections.heading: fees; criminal cases in district court; by whom paid
sections.text: The fees of all witnesses in criminal cases in the district court shall be paid by the county where the indictment is found.SourceLaws 1875, § 1, p. 33;R.S.1913, § 9246;C.S.1922, § 10275;C.S.1929, § 29-2710;R.S.1943, § 29-2710.AnnotationsSection d

sections.heading: not create new liability on county. Hewerkle v. Gage County, 14 Neb. 18, 14 N.W. 549 (1883).
sections.text: not create new liability on county. Hewerkle v. Gage County, 14 Neb. 18, 14 N.W. 549 (1883).
